title: Ruku Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Ruku Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 33
items.translation: How perfect my Lord is, The Supreme.’(three times)

items.title: Dua 34
items.arabic: ((سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ، اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي)).
items.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord and I praise You.  O Allah, forgive me.

items.title: Dua 35
items.translation: Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angles and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).

items.title: Dua 36
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ رَكَعْتُ، وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، خَشَعَ لَكَ سَمْعِي، وَبَصَرِي، وَمُخِّي، وَعَــــظْمِي، وَعَصَبِي، [وَمَا استَقَلَّتْ بِهِ قَدَمِي])).
items.transliteration: Allahumma laka rakaAAt, wabika amant, walaka aslamt, khashaAAa laka samAAee, wabasaree, wamukhkhee, waAAathmee, waAAasabee, wamas-taqalla bihi qadamee.
items.translation: O Allah, unto You I have bowed, and in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My hearing, sight, mind, bones, tendons and what my feet carry are humbled before You.

items.title: Dua 37
items.translation: How perfect He is, The Possessor of total power, sovereignty, magnificence and grandeur.
